useCase.name: Play Rock, Paper, Scissors
useCase.description: Allows the user to play the game in single or multiplayer mode.

preconditions.precondition: User is on the home screen.

successEndConditions.condition: User successfully selects a game mode.

failureEndConditions.condition: User fails to select a game mode.

useCase.trigger: User interacts with the "Piedra, Papel, Tijera" component.

mainSequence.step: HomeRock displays the title "Piedra, Papel, Tijera".
HomeRock sets the game mode to 'single'.
HomeRock sets the game mode to 'multi'.
User clicks the "Back to Home" button.
HomeRock navigates the user back to the home screen.
